package com.codex
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CnpjValidator
    This class has methods to validate CNPJ numbers (Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jur√≠dica) The CNPJ is a number made up of 14 digits, the last two of which are called verification digits (DV).
    Main
    Program main class, offers a menu featuring 6 different tasks + quit option.
    RectangleIntersection
    This class is subdivided into the functionalities check if there is an intersection between two rectangles and compute the area of intersection of two rectangles.
    TimeQuery
    This class queries a server to retrieve the current date and time, for both the local time zone and UTC, using HttpURLConnection to send an HTTP request to the server.
    TodoList
    This class has methods to perform a simple todo list.
